title: Username or password incorrect ??
body:
I tried changing my password and so on.. But that won't load I get error 500 on website.
I cannot log in on 3 of my accounts!!

replies.body: this is happening to me aswell i tried 3 accounts and it wont let me log on......

Having the same issues, can log in via site with main/smurf accounts etc but can not log via client. Can't seem to find any admin posts/fixes about it yet. I see there are a few that are popping up on the forum though. :(
good to hear not the only one thought account got hacked or something
same here no accounts are saying my password at right
